title: How to get a PBE account?
body:
Hi Rioters. I want to know how can i get a PBE account. I really really want to do some testing in this game. I already applied my application in the https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe , however it's been almost two years and i still did not receive any invitation link and it says "Application Received" in My PBE Status. 
Two week ago, my friend got his PBE account and he applied his application around 4 months ago. 

Is there something else I have to do other than applying in the link above?

replies.body: I know you've applied a while ago, but we can't force or guarantee an application.  I also don't have info on increasing your chances beyond out [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ).  Hope that helps clear things up, and good luck!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=XcEio3Iq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-07T17:02:11.629+0000)
>
> I know you've applied a while ago, but we can't force or guarantee an application.  I also don't have info on increasing your chances beyond out [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ).  Hope that helps clear things up, and good luck!

 It is quoted : 
> "Since our goal is to get the best possible feedback to improve the game, we're looking for **_players who are highly engaged with League_**, and_** have proven to be a positive influence in the community**_. We're also looking for **_people who give excellent feedback_**."

* players who are highly engaged with League
* players with a positive influence in the community
* players who give excellent feedback

So, If you have all three, then you just have to wait patiently. If not, work on it.

 Thanks Riot Porocles.
